title: EV-miRNAs from breast cancer patients of plasma as potential prognostic biomarkers of disease recurrence
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Rhafaela Lima Causin, Mariana Regatieri Polezi, Ana Julia Aguiar de Freitas, Stéphanie Calfa, Wanessa Fernanda Altei, Júlia Oliveira Dias, Ana Carolina Laus, Danielle Pessôa-Pereira, Tatiana Takahasi Komoto, Adriane Feijó Evangelista, Cristiano de Pádua Souza, Rui Manuel Reis, Marcia Maria Chiquitelli Marques
